title: David O. Russell Admires the Adorably Spirited Way in Which Women Fight for Equal Pay
text:
David O. Russell Admires the Adorably Spirited Way in Which Women Fight for Equal Pay 
Published By: Defamer - Today 
Jennifer Lawrence’s essay about Hollywood’s gender pay gap is quickly becoming a very popular way for idiot shit people to say regrettab...
